data.title: Time Zones in Pennsylvania, United States
data.meta_description: In which time zone is Pennsylvania? What are the time zone names for standard time and Daylight Saving Time in 2024?
data.text:
05:58:34

Sonntag, 18. August 2024

State: PennsylvaniaAbbreviation: PAState Capital: HarrisburgCountry: United StatesTime Zones: 1

Time Zone Currently Being Used in Pennsylvania

OffsetTime Zone Abbreviation & NameExample CityCurrent TimeUTC -4EDTEastern Daylight TimePhiladelphiaSo, 05:58:34

Eastern Time in Pennsylvania

Time Zone Abbreviation & NameOffsetCurrent TimeETEastern TimeUTC -5:00 / -4:00So, 05:58:34

Note: Local time in these time zones changes when Daylight Saving Time begins and ends.

Time Zone Not Currently Being Observed in Pennsylvania

OffsetTime Zone Abbreviation & NameCommencesUTC -5ESTEastern Standard Time3. Nov 2024

The above time zone is used during other parts of the year. It will become active again after the next clock change as Daylight Saving Time begins or ends.
